title: Effective Completion Strategies for Corporate HRD Online Community E-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Corporate Training Systems and Basic Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Design of e-learning completion strategies to enhance math-based job competencies for practicing professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain how individual and organizational factors influence e-learning completion rates.
Learners can propose at least three effective online learning strategies in resource-constrained technological environments.
Through project-based assessments, learners can develop an e-learning design framework applicable to real-world businesses.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
